resources.string: Quickly get important test information about your connection to NextDNS.
Quickly check ping times to NextDNS servers.
This is the main notification channel for NextDNS Manager.
This is the main update channel for NextDNS Manager.
Secure DNS is being used AND device is connected to NextDNS.
Secure DNS is being used but device is NOT connected to NextDNS.
Secure DNS is NOT being used.
This is a generic content description.
This app is NOT an official NextDNS app. This app and its developer are NOT in any way affiliated or related to NextDNS.
Please consider whitelisting the list of domains below to allow anonymized crash and error reporting as well as push notifications. This greatly helps in my effort to make this app better!
If you experience any problems with this app, there are a couple of things that you can try.
Try clearing the app cache by pressing the button below.
Try checking for app updates, or reinstalling the app.
If your problem is not resolved by either of the steps above, consider reporting your issue on the Github issue tracker. Tap on the icon below to access it.
Thanks for agreeing to share your feedback! Please enter a description of what you were doing when the error occurred and then submit.
What were you doing when the error occurred?
